physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe fatigue, constipation, anorexia, nocturnal agitation, confusion, psychomotor slowing, shivers.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Later symptoms included myoclonus, grimacing, divergent bulbi, tetraparesis, sopor, coma.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Weakness, vertigo, unsteady gait, headache, abdominal pain, confusion, psychomotor slowing, shivers, fever.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Later symptoms included myoclonus, opsoclonus, sopor, coma.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Unsteady gait, anogenital numbness, problems passing urine and stool, headache, confusion, psychomotor slowing, mood disturbances, fever.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Later symptoms included ocular paresis, sopor, coma.
